STYLE.NAME: Open Category Mead
STYLE.NOTES: Any mead that does not fit neartly into one of the other mead categories. May also include a combination of ingredients from two or more other mead categories.
STYLE.PROFILE: Varies according to mix, but should be well balanced and pleasant in character.
STYLE.INGREDIENTS: Vary by style and ingredients. Must be a honey based beverage.
STYLE.EXAMPLES: Jadwiga, Rabbit's Foot Private Reserve Pear Mead, White Winter Cherry Bracket, Saba Tej, Mountain Meadows Aguave Mead
